text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Mitochondrial Disorders

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    10394003 Friedreich's ataxia (disorder)
    124165006 Deficiency of succinate dehydrogenase (disorder)
    133791000119107 Mitochondrial metabolism defect (disorder)
    16851005 Mitochondrial myopathy (disorder)
    230426003 Myoclonic epilepsy with ragged red fibers (disorder)
    237985009 Pearson's syndrome (disorder)
    240096000 Mitochondrial cytopathy (disorder)
    25792000 Kearns-Sayre syndrome (disorder)
    37934003 Mitochondrial-lipid-glycogen storage myopathy (disorder)
    39925003 Juvenile myopathy, encephalopathy, lactic acidosis AND stroke (disorder)
    447292006 Mitochondrial encephalomyopathy (disorder)
    4477007 Juvenile myopathy AND lactate acidosis (disorder)
    46683007 Pyruvate dehydrogenase complex deficiency (disorder)
    472320005 Maternally inherited mitochondrial cardiomyopathy and myopathy (disorder)
    58610003 Leber's optic atrophy (disorder)
    67434000 Cytochrome-c oxidase deficiency (disorder)
    702366001 Childhood myocerebrohepatopathy spectrum (disorder)
    709414007 Deficiency of mitochondrial complex III (disorder)
    715338007 Fatal infantile lactic acidosis co-occurrent with methylmalonic aciduria (disorder)

    719430008 Leber plus disease (disorder)
    720951008 Fatal mitochondrial disease due to combined oxidative phosphorylation deficiency 3 (disorder)

    722207000 Pancreatic insufficiency, dyserythropoietic anemia, calvarial hyperostosis syndrome (disorder)
    722212004 Severe X-linked mitochondrial encephalomyopathy (disorder)
    724138007 Mitochondrial myopathy with sideroblastic anemia syndrome (disorder)
    724173009 Maternally inherited cardiomyopathy and hearing loss syndrome (disorder)
    724227000 Infantile onset spinocerebellar ataxia (disorder)
    724279004 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 5 (disorder)
    724784006 Demyelination of central nervous system co-occurrent and due to mitochondrial disease (disorder)
    725394006 Autosomal recessive ataxia due to ubiquinone deficiency (disorder)
    725464001 Adult-onset chronic progressive external ophthalmoplegia with mitochondrial myopathy (disorder)
    726702005 Epileptic encephalopathy with global cerebral demyelination (disorder)
    732245008 Pure mitochondrial myopathy (disorder)
    732951005 Mitochondrial myopathy, lactic acidosis, deafness syndrome (disorder)
    733599009 Adult-onset multiple mitochondrial deoxyribonucleic acid deletion syndrome due to deoxyguanosine kinase deficiency (disorder)
    733600007 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 8 (disorder)
    735421004 Leukoencephalopathy with brain stem and spinal cord involvement and high lactate syndrome (disorder)
    735732003 Liver disease co-occurrent and due to mitochondrial disorder (disorder)
    763110007 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 13 (disorder)
    763203009 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 15 (disorder)
    763204003 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 7 (disorder)
    763209008 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 9 (disorder)
    763211004 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 21 (disorder)
    763280005 Encephalopathy, hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, renal tubular disease syndrome (disorder)
    763366000 Leukoencephalopathy, thalamus and brainstem anomalies, high lactate syndrome (disorder)
    763688008 Deafness, encephaloneuropathy, obesity, valvulopathy syndrome (disorder)
    764733009 Progressive external ophthalmoplegia, myopathy, emaciation syndrome (disorder)
    764943000 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 2 (disorder)
    765100000 Ribonucleotide reductase regulatory TP53 inducible subunit M2B-related mitochondrial deoxyribonucleic acid depletion syndrome encephalomyopathic form with renal tubulopathy (disorder)
    765401006 Mitochondrial deoxyribonucleic acid depletion syndrome encephalomyopathic form (disorder)
    765403009 F-box and leucine rich repeat protein 4 related mitochondrial deoxyribonucleic acid depletion syndrome encephalomyopathic form (disorder)
    766251006 Lethal infantile mitochondrial myopathy (disorder)
    766876004 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 4 (disorder)
    771469002 Early-onset spastic ataxia, myoclonic epilepsy, neuropathy syndrome (disorder)

    771509001 Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and renal tubular disease due to mitochondrial deoxyribonucleic acid mutation (disorder)
    771513008 Infantile hypertrophic cardiomyopathy due to mitochondrial ribosomal protein L44 deficiency (disorder)
    773398005 Congenital cataract, progressive muscular hypotonia, hearing loss, developmental delay syndrome (disorder)
    773423007 Severe neonatal lactic acidosis due to NFS1-ISD11 complex deficiency (disorder)
    773492007 Childhood-onset spasticity with hyperglycinemia (disorder)
    774154008 Periodic paralysis with later-onset distal motor neuropathy (disorder)
    775908005 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 17 (disorder)

    778029000 FAST kinase domains 2-related infantile mitochondrial encephalomyopathy (disorder)

    783157004 Leigh syndrome with nephrotic syndrome (disorder)
    783178001 Combined oxidative phosphorylation deficiency type 20 (disorder)
    783558004 Combined oxidative phosphorylation defect type 11 (disorder)
    783722008 Myopathy and diabetes mellitus (disorder)
    784347002 Autosomal recessive spastic ataxia, optic atrophy, dysarthria syndrome (disorder)
    784370005 Mitochondrial myopathy with reversible cytochrome C oxidase deficiency (disorder)
    827115000 Autosomal dominant progressive external ophthalmoplegia (disorder)
    827117008 Autosomal recessive progressive external ophthalmoplegia (disorder)
    87694001 Pyruvate carboxylase deficiency (disorder)
    93466004 Gonadal dysgenesis with auditory dysfunction, autosomal recessive inheritance (disorder)
